title.newValue: Microsoft Purview | eDiscovery (Premium): eDiscovery guest reviewer

description.newValue:
,This feature enables secure and convenient external guest reviewer access to eDiscovery (Premium) review sets within a case. This feature empowers eDiscovery (Premium) admins and managers to follow more traditional collaboration practices that will boost confidence and workflow defensibility by allowing outside counsel to cooperate more directly without increasing cost or risk.Â 
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: April CY2023
